channel.title: Help with portforwarding
channel.description:
So I have ported correctly my router, I have added the exceptions into my firewall, there are no exceptions listings on avast that I am seeing for ports as well.
So my question is, what else could be blocking the port? Every time I go to the portforward port checker it says the port is not open.
I am using a tl-wr740n router.
contact by misterpeo88@hotmaill.com

item.title: Help with portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
